title: Randomly disconnecting from games.
body:
This is the second time this has happened, but on the PBE im in the middle of a fight or something other, and suddenly everything stops moving. I wouldnt say it freezes, because the animations are still moving, but it stays like that. I exit out of the game, and when I try to enter back in I get an error message, 
"Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game"
however everything else internet related is working just fine? Ive tried exiting the client completely and reconnecting, but nothing seems to work. Last time this happened I had to wait until the game was over completely before starting a new game.

replies.body: It sounds like you've got an unstable connection ranging from packet loss to failure getting back to the game server.  Even though your internet works you can have issues getting to specific services.  You should go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot your network and get back in.  Let me know if you have any questions!
